Class JacksonUtils

java.lang.Object
org.krmdemo.techlabs.core.utils.JacksonUtils
public class JacksonUtils extends Object
Utility class to serialize / de-serialize JSON-Objects and JSON-Arrays using Jackson Library

      public static Map<String,Object> jsonObjFromResource(String resourcePath)
      Parameters:
      resourcePath - the path to JSON-resource within the current class-path (no leading slash !!!)
      Returns:
      de-serialized JSON-Object as Map

      public static <T> T jsonValueFromFile(File jsonFile, com.fasterxml.jackson.core.type.TypeReference<T> typeRef)
      Type Parameters:
      T - the type to de-serialize the JSON-value to
      Parameters:
      jsonFile - a file that contains JSON-value
      typeRef - a type-reference to cast the de-serialized object to
      Returns:
      de-serialized JSON-vlaue of type T
